measure.name: residential_hvac_evaporative_cooler
measure.description: This measure removes any existing HVAC components from the building and adds an evaporative cooler with an on/off supply fan to a unitary air loop. For multifamily buildings, the evaporative cooler can be set for all units of the building. See https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-BEopt#workflows for supported workflows using this measure.
measure.modeler_description: Any supply components or baseboard convective electrics/waters are removed from any existing air/plant loops or zones. Any existing air/plant loops are also removed. An evaporative cooler element "EvaporativeCoolerDirectResearchSpecial" and an on/off supply fan are added to a unitary air loop. The unitary air loop is added to the supply inlet node of the air loop. This air loop is added to a branch for the living zone.# A diffuser is added to the branch for the living zone as well as for the finished basement if it exists.

argument.name: dse
argument.description: Defines the energy losses associated with the delivery of energy from the equipment to the source of the load.
